replies.replyComment: @Hansaka Senevirathne ballata balanapan langathi monatha wenney kiyala. awajathaka posniyek uba. ubalath ekka kathakarala wadak naha. ubalawagey un marila yanna oney mey lankawen.

@Hansaka Senevirathne a ubey ammata wenna athi ekai uba mehema para ballaek wagey inney. hadiyawen Penawa thogey.  gahaniyekta katha karanna danney nathi gon samanalaya. yako apith giyea sinhala school tham kolamba inney sinhala yaaluwo thama un ubala wagey naha.ubalawagey parayo thama rata deka karanney .mariyan kohey hari hapila. thowagey mooda moosala samanala gotukola poniyek. mama aasa naha amma thatha adinna paw agollo. thamusegey hadiyawanam binduwai. lajja wiyan buddagama wela ipadunai kiyala. pansil pada paha danna eka anugamanaya karana kawruth mehema katha karanney naha. yako mang bauda sangamaey sabapathi ,pirith nool pawa api bandinawa school ekey jaathi  beda balanney naha. ubalawagey sakkili mariyalla

@Hansaka Senevirathne kari wesi kiyala kiyapan thogey ammata. paraya. katha karanna danney nathi gon awajathaka balla. tho wagey un maranney naha ney tsunami yakin hari. awajathaka samalanaya. huththata gahapan thogey ammagey. katha karanna dana ganin sakkilya. tho wasa bothalak arang mariyan
@Hansaka Senevirathne ubalawagey ballo thama honda oota. gahaniyekta katha karanna danney nathi napunsakayek uba. demapiyan hada tiyana hati katin penawa.  ubawa haduwata agollo lajja wenna oney
